website_summaries.verdict: The Canon imageFormula P-208 II Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner combines capable hardware with limited software, making it of interest only if you already have all the scan-related software you need, or don't mind buying some.
pros: Includes both a full scan utility for installation on a PC, and a light version (included in firmware) for scanning without installing anything
cons: No optical-character-recognition (OCR) capability for converting scans to editable text

customer_reviews.title: Will be shopping for a better scanner. Would have returned if I had kept ...
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is only ok. Since the feeder is short, the pages often end up skewed. You can try to unskew using their software but it's less than ideal. The bigger problem is that within two weeks (and probably only after scanning 25 pages, the scanner constantly reports there is not paper in the scanner. The auto holder has the paper, but the machine doesn't register that it's there. It can scan after alot of manual adjustments to the machine, but now it's page by page and totally inefficient. Will be shopping for a better scanner. Would have returned if I had kept packaging.
customer_reviews.author: TBClark

customer_reviews.title: could not save
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way this connected easily to the laptop, scanned double sided paper beautifully....But Could Not Save!! Kept getting error messages. So disappointing! Wish technical support could help solve so i won't have to return.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Never worked! Not once! On any computer we installed it on!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work! Tried to have our network computer guys install it again and apparently now it is too late to return it! This got such great reviews and we couldn't even get our computer to recognize it was attached. I wish I could give this negative stars. I can't believe I missed the window to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous portable scanner. It squeaks a little, but works great! I like the computer interface - the ability to delete pages, move pages, re-scan pages that don't scan right, then save. Perfect for anyone with large quantities of pages to scan in the office or on the go!
customer_reviews.author: K. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, space-efficient Scan-tini
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, practical use scanning: clear, makes pages sendable via computer. Space saver, portable, lightweight, great for space-limited offices. important to treat it gently. In learning to use it, initially jammed it: company sent 2 refurbished machines in sequence, then a brand new one. The efficiency of their service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Au

customer_reviews.title: Liked my old ScanSnap 100% more
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of Canon photography gear so I thought I would replace my old ScanSnap 1100 that died after 10 years with this unit. Instructions, what you can find are definitely not clear. Unit is harder to load. Connecting it to Evernote is not easy and cumbersome. And the unit is physically bigger. So far not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bilge Rat

customer_reviews.title: It has lots of dull spots. I will definitely return it and order ...
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is made in Japan, which says a lot about its quality, but it does not look brand new. It has lots of dull spots. I will definitely return it and order a new one. Hopefully it will be brand new, the way it is advertised on amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: There were so many errors that continuously popped up. There was no software that came with the product. It is not a plug and go. Very complicated to use. And I'm outside my return window....
customer_reviews.author: Shericka

customer_reviews.title: Feeder
customer_reviews.text: When scanning a document, you must ensure that you hold and guide your documents properly through the feeder to avoid them to appear crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Rios

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's meant to do
customer_reviews.text: Good little scanner. It's our second one in the office because we use the other one so much. Great for a traveling or home office.
customer_reviews.author: Raetha

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and works very well so far
customer_reviews.text: Needed a scanner that would handle legal forms and other long paper. Easy setup and works very well so far. No issues with the device or the operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E Blighton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better then I was expected. Completely serves my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor IJG

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very portable, Love Canon products in general!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: The power cord was not compatible with my 2015 Dell Laptop.I would have to buy a new cord but there is no guarantee that it will work, so what's the point? VERY disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level scanner
customer_reviews.text: For my needs this is a great scanner. I don't need speed or volume due to limited documents that need scanning. I bought this to reduce clutter in my office and it is working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Software doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using this several times and updated the software and it will not work. Reached out to tech support and they couldn't figure out what the issues were.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install and the quality is great!!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use, plug in and it was ready to work right off the bat. Images were scanned perfectly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Canon P-208II ImageFORMULA Personal Document Scanner, Black
product_meta.description: The Canon ImageFORMULA p‐208ii scan‐tini personal document scanner's ultra‐compact size and robust features make it ideal for mobile use at home, the office, and virtually anywhere in between. It moves from location to location as easily as it moves paper‐based information to select windows and Mac devices, and beyond. Canon ImageFORMULA p‐208ii scans in color or black-and-white & also it can an handle a variety of document types including thick or thin, plastic or embossed documents. One of the very robust features are character emphasis that improves legibility of hard-to-capture documents, auto resolution setting & photograph optimization.
feature_bullets: Stay organized: Easily convert your paper documents into digital formats (searchable PDF, JPG, and more) or scan directly to the cloud (Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Box, QuickBooks Online, Evernote, SharePoint, and more)
Convenient and portable: Slim, lightweight and sleek, to fit easily into a briefcase or bag, for use at home or on the road
Handles many different document types: Receipts, photos, business cards, long documents, and more
Fast and efficient: Scans both sides of a document at the same time, in color, at up to 8 pages-per-minute
Broad compatibility: Supports Windows and Mac; TWAIN driver also included
Bundled software: Powerful, yet easy-to-use scanning software, as well as a business card organizer
Backed by a one-year warranty and US-based technical support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
